jobTitle: Senior Data Scientist, Oracle Supply Chain Operations
jobDescription: Designs, develops and programs methods, processes, and systems to consolidate and analyze unstructured, diverse "big data" sources to generate actionable insights and solutions for client services and product enhancement.
